mapper.select: select id,DICITEMDESC,DICITEMID,DICITEMNAME,PARENTID from DictionaryItem where DICTIONARY_ID = #{_parameter} order by id desc

SELECT d.ID, d.DICITEMDESC, d.DICITEMID, d.DICITEMNAME, d.PARENTID, t.DICNAME, e.DICITEMNAME as parentName FROM DictionaryItem d LEFT JOIN TZDICTIONARY t on t.ID=d.DICTIONARY_ID LEFT JOIN DictionaryItem e ON d.PARENTID = e.id where d.DICTIONARY_ID = #{_parameter} order by id desc
SELECT A.ID, A.DICDESC, A.DICNAME, A.ISENABLE, A.PARENTID, B.DICNAME AS PARENTNAME FROM TZDICTIONARY A left JOIN TZDICTIONARY B ON B.ID=A.PARENTID
mapper.insert: insert into dictionaryitem(id, dicitemdesc, dicitemid, dicitemname, parentid, dictionary_id ) values (#{id},#{dicItemDesc},#{dicItemId},#{dicItemName},#{parentId},#{dictionaryId})
mapper.select: select t.id as dicId, t.dicname, t.parentid as dicParentId, t.isenable as dicIsEnabel, t.dicdesc as dicDescription, d.id as itemId, d.dicitemid as dicItemId, d.dicitemname, d.parentid as dicItemParentId, d.dicitemdesc as dicItemDescription from TZDICTIONARY t inner join DICTIONARYITEM d on t.id = d.dictionary_id
